verses.verse: <S%G1063>Are<s%> we <S%G2532>beginning<s%> again <S%G3588>to<s%> commend <S%G1392>ourselves?<s%> Or do <S%G1392>we<s%> <S%G3761>need,<s%> as do <S%G1391>some,<s%> <S%G1722>letters<s%> <S%G5129>of<s%> <S%G3313>commendation<s%> to you <S%G1752>or<s%> from <S%G1391>you?<s%>

<S%G5319>being<s%> <S%G3754>revealed<s%> that you <S%G2075>are<s%> a <S%G1992>letter<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1247>served<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G2257>us,<s%> <S%G1449>written<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> with <S%G3188>ink,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> with the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4109>tablets<s%> of <S%G3035>stone,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4109>tablets<s%> that are <S%G2588>hearts<s%> of <S%G4560>flesh.<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2427>made<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> sufficient as <S%G1249>servants<s%> of a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>covenant;<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> of the <S%G1121>letter,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G1121>letter<s%> <S%G615>kills,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> gives <S%G2227>life.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G1248>service<s%> of <S%G1722>death,<s%> <S%G1121>written<s%> <S%G1795>engraved<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G3037>stones,<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1391>glory,<s%> so <S%G5620>that<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G816>look<s%> steadfastly <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4383>face;<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was passing <S%G2673>away:<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> most <S%G2532>certainly<s%> that <S%G3588>which<s%> has been made <S%G1392>glorious<s%> <S%G1392>has<s%> <S%G3761>not<s%> been made <S%G1391>glorious<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3313>respect,<s%> by reason <S%G1752>of<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G5235>surpasses.<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2509>as<s%> <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> who <S%G5087>put<s%> a <S%G2571>veil<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> <S%G4383>face,<s%> <S%G4314>that<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G3361>wouldn't<s%> <S%G816>look<s%> steadfastly <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%> of that <S%G3588>which<s%> was passing <S%G2673>away.<s%>

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3540>minds<s%> were <S%G4456>hardened,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> this very <S%G4594>day<s%> at the <S%G320>reading<s%> of the <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G1242>covenant<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2571>veil<s%> <S%G3306>remains,<s%> because <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> it passes <S%G2673>away.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1563>is,<s%> there is <S%G1657>liberty.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G4383>with<s%> <S%G343>unveiled<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> beholding as in a <S%G2734>mirror<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> are <S%G3339>transformed<s%> into the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G1504>image<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1391>glory,<s%> even <S%G2509>as<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>
